snippet: The expulsion vote against Silvio Berlusconi represents his second setback of the week, after his failed attempt to bring down the country’s fragile coalition government.
abstract: Special panel of the Italian Senate votes to strip Silvio Berlusconi of his seat, humiliating blow for man who has dominated Italy for the past two decades but whose political career is now very much in jeopardy; expulsion vote is based on Berlusconi's tax fraud conviction and comes after his failed attempt to bring down country's coalition government.

byline.original: By JIM YARDLEY and GAIA PIANIGIANI

lead_paragraph: The expulsion vote against Silvio Berlusconi represents his second setback of the week, after his failed attempt to bring down the country’s fragile coalition government.

headline.main: Dealing a Blow to Berlusconi, an Italian Senate Panel Recommends His Expulsion
headline.print_headline: Dealing a Blow to Berlusconi, an Italian Senate Panel Recommends His Expulsion
